about_the_game:
Bear the colours of the Raven Guard Successor Chapters with the Raven Guard Cosmetic Pack!

The Raven Guard Cosmetic Pack is available as part of the Season Pass.

This DLC contains more than 40 cosmetic items and options including chapter heraldry for the left and right pauldrons, decals, unique helmets, knee markings, and colour packs from 8 Raven Guard chapters:

Black Guard

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Right Pauldron Fire Support marking

- Right Greave 1st Squad marking

- Left Greave 1st Squad marking

- Right Greave 2nd Squad marking

- Left Greave 2nd Squad marking

Revilers

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Gray Seer Colour Pack

- Right Pauldron Fire Support marking (x2)

- Right Pauldron Kayvaan Shrike marking

- Mk VI “Corvus” Left Pauldron

Raptors

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Deathworld Forest Colour Pack

- Right Greave 3rd Squad marking

- Left Greave 3rd Squad marking

- Left Greave 4th Squad marking

- Raven Guard Mk VI “Corvus” helmet

Death Specters

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Warpfiend Gray Colour Pack

- Right Pauldron Battleline marking

- Right Greave 4th Squad marking

- Right Pauldron Close Support marking

- Raven Guard Mk VI “Corvus” breastplate

Rift Stalkers

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Yriel Yellow Tertiary Colour Pack

- Right Pauldron Battleline marking

- Right Greave 5th Squad marking

- Left Greave 5th Squad marking

- Right Greave 6th Squad marking

- Mk VI “Corvus” helmet

Necropolis Hawks

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Thunderhawk Blue Colour Pack

- Necropolis Hawks Helm Pattern

- Right Pauldron Close Support marking (x2)

- Left Greave 6th Squad marking

Iron Ravens

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Right Pauldron Veteran marking

- Right Greave 7th Squad marking

- Left greave 7th Squad marking

- Right Greave 8th Squad marking

- Left greave 8th Squad marking

- Raven Guard Mk VI “Corvus” Right Pauldron

Knights of the Raven

- Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

- Celestra Gray Colour Pack

- Right Pauldron Veteran marking

- Right Greave 9th Squad marking

- Left greave 9th Squad marking

- Right Greave 10th Squad marking

- Left greave 10th Squad marking

content_descriptors.notes:
Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios with characters using their weapons to slash/stab enemies.

Strong Language is used in the dialogue.

short_description: Bear the colours of the Raven Guard Successor Chapters with the Raven Guard Cosmetic Pack! This DLC contains more than 40 cosmetic items and options from 8 Raven Guard chapters. The Raven Guard Cosmetic Pack is available as part of the Season Pass.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Czech, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Thai
*languages with full audio support
